name: Peer 365
description:
We specialize in search engine optimization services, also known as SEO services, organic SEO services - Google has made significant number of changes over the past years with the release of humming bird, penguin and panda release cycles. On any given day, google, yahoo and bing search engines craws millions of pages of website content, downloads them onto internal company servers.
Then they take this information and parses it into topic, categories, etc using internal mathematical formulas.
